dmca.title: Notification of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Support [mailto:support@bet-won.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 17, 2005 12:08 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: admin@goldenpalace.com
Subject: Notification of Copyright Infringement


Lance Crosby, Esq. 
Chief Operating Officer 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries 
1333 Stemmons Freeway Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207 
 
 
Dear  Lance Crosby, Esq.:

In performing a routine Google search for our Domain name of Bet-Won.com we
found one of your hosted sites  [  <http://www.nmtc.net/>
http://www.nmtc.net/ = [ 70.84.113.250
< <http://www.samspade.org/t/whois?a=70.84.113.250;server=auto>
http://www.samspade.org/t/whois?a=70.84.113.250;server=auto> ] using our
Copyrighted and Registered URL Name to keyword spam their site up into the
search engines. The violation is located below the fold on your browser when
you open the abusive pages listed below.

Please see:  <http://www.nmtc.net/Gamble/greyhound-handicapping.php>
http://www.nmtc.net/Gamble/greyhound-handicapping.php

We have also found it in them spamming our URL name in these areas as well
and who knows how many more:

 <http://www.daltokyo.com/Gamble/angle-handicapping-horse-racing.php>
http://www.daltokyo.com/Gamble/angle-handicapping-horse-racing.php

 <http://www.centrex-france.com/Gamble/greyhound-handicapping-system.php>
http://www.centrex-france.com/Gamble/greyhound-handicapping-system.php

 <http://www.arkzin.com/Betting/triple-crown-betting-odds.php>
http://www.arkzin.com/Betting/triple-crown-betting-odds.php


We are therefore placing you on notice that we would like a Cease and Desist
placed on that Website hosted with your company from using our name Bet-Won
(notice they use the hyphen in their SPAM!) to steer our traffic to their
website. Also that they immediately and fully REMOVE all keywords referring
to bet-won.com on their site.
 
I declare and state here and now the operators of the above site(s) have
absolutely ZERO affiliation with my site www.bet-won.com and are not
authorized to use our registered URL as a keyword in promoting their
offshore gambling site.
 
Per your requirements, I declare under penalties of perjury that I am the
owner of www.bet-won.com and am fully authorized to speak on this matter.
See below:
 
WhoIs (bet-won.com)[whois.opensrs.net]

Registrant:
John Chiappetta
125 S. Jefferson Street #2002
Chicago, IL 60661
US

Domain name: BET-WON.COM

Administrative Contact:
Direct, Domain  <mailto:admin-contact@domaindirect.net>
admin-contact@domaindirect.net
96 Mowat Avenue
Toronto, ON M6K 3M1
CA
+1.4165312084 Fax: +1.4165315584

Technical Contact:
Domain, Direct  <mailto:dnstech@domaindirect.com> dnstech@domaindirect.com
96 Mowat Avenue
Toronto, ON M6K 3M1
CA
+1.4165350123 Fax: +1.4165312516


Registration Service Provider:
Domain Direct,  <mailto:dnstech@domaindirect.com> dnstech@domaindirect.com
1-416-531-2084
http://www.domaindirect.com
This company may be contacted for domain login/passwords,
DNS/Nameserver changes, and general domain support questions.

Registrar of Record: TUCOWS, INC.
Record last updated on 23-Feb-2005.
Record expires on 25-Jul-2006.
Record created on 25-Jul-2002.

Domain status: ACTIVE 
 
I look forward to your prompt action and reply in this matter. 

Sincerely,

John Chiappetta
Owner/Operator Bet-Won.com
125 S Jefferson Street #2002
Chicago, IL 60661
312-876-1410
914-309-9347
support@bet-won.com
